name: com.epicentreunsw.hevs
description:
HEVS (High-End Visualization System) is a Unity plugin that attempts to simplify the creation of cross-platform multi-modal visualization projects across various display mediums (hardware solutions), including within clustered display environments.

HEVS supports various visualisation platforms, including PC, CAVE, XR, Multitouch Walls, Hemispherical Domes and other curved projection-based displays, such as cylinders, and includes warping & blending functionallity.

Although it is impossible to automatically cover all platforms, the philosophy of HEVS is to make it as easy as possible to create a single application that can run in various environments, attempting to allow for a single executable to run on different display modalities without the need to re-build.

samples.description:
These sample assets demonstrate various configuration options for HEVS.

Included is an example warp offset image.

It is recommended that you copy these assets into your StreamingAssets folder.
